00021 inline Cell* make_int(int i)
00022 {
00023   Cell* cell = (Cell*)malloc(sizeof(struct Cell));
00024   cell->tag_m = type_int;
00025   cell->int_m = i;
00026   return cell;
00027 }

00033 inline Cell* make_double(double d)
00034 {
00035   Cell* cell = (Cell*)malloc(sizeof(struct Cell));
00036   cell->tag_m = type_double;
00037   cell->double_m = d;
00038   return cell;

00045 inline Cell* make_symbol(const char* s)
00046 {
00047   Cell* cell = (Cell*)malloc(sizeof(struct Cell));
00048   char* str = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char*));
00049   strcpy(str, s);
00050   cell->symbol_m = str;
00051   cell->tag_m = type_symbol;
00052   return cell;
00053 }

00061 inline Node* make_node(Cell* my_elem, Node* my_next)
00062 {
00063   Node* node = (Node*)malloc(sizeof(struct Node));
00064   node->elem_m = my_elem;
00065   node->next_m = my_next;
00066   return node;
00067 }

00073 inline bool intp(const Cell* c)
00074 {
00075   return c->tag_m == type_int ? true : false;
00076 }
00077 
00082 inline bool doublep(const Cell* c)
00083 {
00084   return c->tag_m == type_double ? true : false;
00085 }
00086 
00091 inline bool symbolp(const Cell* c)
00092 {
00093   return c->tag_m == type_symbol ? true : false;
00094 }

00100 inline int get_int(const Cell* c)
00101 {
00102   if(!intp(c)) {
00103     std::cerr << "Error: Given Cell is not an int type node.\n";
00104     return 0;
00105   }
00106   return c->int_m;
00107 }
00108 
00113 inline double get_double(const Cell* c)
00114 {
00115   if(!doublep(c)){
00116     std::cerr << "Error: Given cell is not a double type node.\n";
00117     exit(1);
00118   }
00119   return c->double_m;
00120 }
00121 
00127 inline char* get_symbol(const Cell* c)
00128 {
00129   if(!symbolp(c)){
00130     std::cerr << "Error: Given cell is not a symbol type node\n";
00131     exit(1);
00132   }
00133   return c->symbol_m;
00134 }

00140 inline Cell* get_elem(const Node* n)
00141 {
00142   return n != NULL ? n->elem_m : NULL;
00143 }
00144 
00149 inline Node* get_next(const Node* n)
00150 {
00151   return n != NULL ? n->next_m : NULL;
00152 }

00159 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Node& n)
00160 {
00161   Node copy = n;
00162   const Node* curr = &copy;
00163 
00164   if(curr == NULL){
00165     std::cerr << "Error at operator<<(std::ostream&os, const Node& n)\n";
00166     std::cerr << "Error: Given head node n is pointing to NULL.\n";
00167     return os;
00168   }
00169 
00170   os << "(";
00171   do{
00172     if(intp(get_elem(curr)))
00173       os << get_int(get_elem(curr));
00174     else if(doublep(get_elem(curr)))
00175       os << get_double(get_elem(curr));
00176     else if(symbolp(get_elem(curr)))
00177       os << get_symbol(get_elem(curr));
00178 
00179     curr = get_next(curr);
00180     if(curr != NULL)
00181       os << " ";
00182   }while(curr != NULL);
00183  
00184   os << ")";
00185   return os;
00186 }
